Class SourceGeneratorUtils

Namespace
osu.Framework.Utils

A set of helper functions for source generators to use in order to simplify their work.

Methods

CacheDependency(DependencyContainer, Type, object?, CacheInfo, Type?, string?, string?)

Caches an object to a DependencyContainer.

public static void CacheDependency(DependencyContainer container, Type callerType, object? obj, CacheInfo info, Type? asType, string? cachedName, string? propertyName)

Parameters

container DependencyContainer

The DependencyContainer which the object will be cached to.

callerType Type

The type of object calling this method.

obj object

The object to be cached.

info CacheInfo

The parenting CacheInfo object.

asType Type

The type which obj should be cached as.

cachedName string

The name which obj should be cached as.

propertyName string

A fallback name for obj to be cached as.

Exceptions

NullDependencyException

If obj is null.

GetDependency(IReadOnlyDependencyContainer, Type, Type, string?, Type?, bool, bool)

Retrieves an object from an IReadOnlyDependencyContainer.

public static object? GetDependency(IReadOnlyDependencyContainer container, Type type, Type callerType, string? cachedName, Type? cachedParent, bool allowNulls, bool rebindBindables)

Parameters

container IReadOnlyDependencyContainer

The IReadOnlyDependencyContainer to retrieve the dependency from.

type Type

The type of the object to retrieve.

callerType Type

The type of object calling this method.

cachedName string

The name of the object.

cachedParent Type

The parent of the object.

allowNulls bool

Whether the returned object is allowed to be null.

rebindBindables bool

If the object is a IBindable, whether it should be re-bound via GetBoundCopy().

Returns

object

The object.

Exceptions

DependencyNotRegisteredException

If the dependency is not in container.

GetDependency<T>(IReadOnlyDependencyContainer, Type, string?, Type?, bool, bool)

Retrieves an object from an IReadOnlyDependencyContainer.

public static T GetDependency<T>(IReadOnlyDependencyContainer container, Type callerType, string? cachedName, Type? cachedParent, bool allowNulls, bool rebindBindables)

Parameters

container IReadOnlyDependencyContainer

The IReadOnlyDependencyContainer to retrieve the dependency from.

callerType Type

The type of object calling this method.

cachedName string

The name of the object.

cachedParent Type

The parent of the object.

allowNulls bool

Whether the returned object is allowed to be null.

rebindBindables bool

If the object is a IBindable, whether it should be re-bound via GetBoundCopy().

Returns

T

The object.

Type Parameters

T

The type of the object.

Exceptions

DependencyNotRegisteredException

If the dependency is not in container.
